benchmark_details.name: Dataset of Human-Rated News Headlines
benchmark_details.overview: This work contributes a dataset of 840 human-rated news headlinesâ€”written by humans, AI, or the combination, which could be used as an evaluation set for further leveraged with reinforcement learning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To explore how humans can best harness the power of LLMs in writing tasks, in terms of both quality and efficiency.

data.source: 840 headlines generated through a controlled experiment with human and AI interactions.
data.annotation: Human-rated by 20 evaluators to assess quality.

methodology.calculation: Headlines were rated using the Taste-Attractiveness-Clarity-Truth (TACT) framework.
methodology.interpretation: Evaluators ranked each headline for overall quality.
methodology.validation: Kruskal-Wallis H test and pairwise comparisons for headline quality.
